title: Help site documentation
description: Our help site has all the guidance and technical documentation you need to make the most of KoboToolbox. Find the answer to your questions in one of our many articles.

title: Join the community
description: Are you stuck with a problem you canâ€™t find the answer to? Try our forum and see what the KoboToolbox community can do for you, and how you can help others!

title: Learn about XLSForms
description: This site will help you author XLSForms. XLSForm is a tool used to simplify the creation of forms. XLSForm will convert forms authored in Excel into XForms that can be used with a number of web or mobile platforms.
